overview: To many, the prom is the singular most important event in a young woman's life. It's the night that caps off their senior year and takes them from teen to womanhood. It's a night of inhibitions being let go, wild no holds partying, and for some the chance to finally get their cherries popped. Here is the story of a group of girls who have entered into a pact to lose their virginity on prom night.
title: Prom Night Virgins
